snippet: Interest in storm chasing has surged, with amateurs now jockeying with seasoned professionals. The risks of the hobby were apparent Sunday when relatives confirmed the death of a veteran chaser.
abstract: Deaths of veteran storm chaser Tim Samaras, his son Paul, and his colleague Carl Young while chasing storms that ravaged parts of Oklahoma underscores risks inherent in the pursuit; interest in storm chasing has surged in recent years.
lead_paragraph: Interest in storm chasing has surged, with amateurs now jockeying with seasoned professionals. The risks of the hobby were apparent Sunday when relatives confirmed the death of a veteran chaser.

headline.main: Chasing the Storm, but Hoping Not to Catch It
headline.print_headline: Storm Chasers’ Deaths Show Dangers of an Exploding Field
